Students from departments   outside of History must receive approval from the instructor prior to   enrolling in a History course.  Please   forward an email with the instructor's endorsement to: Alyson Lounsbury,   Graduate Program Assistant (history.dept@nyu.edu), along with your request   for a permission code.   To view course descriptions and syllabi, click on the course   title. For additional information about a specific course, please contact the   professor directly. (DBi) Program   Semester Abroad   Summer Programs   Faculty-Led Courses   Other Opportunities     Contact Us             Home / Portal & Partners / Office of Student Engagement / International Programs / Semester Abroad                        Share / Print                Print      Email      Share       Like                                              Semester Abroad  Providing transformative global opportunities to students  Stern MBA students have the opportunity to study abroad for the Fall or Spring semester through a number of Exchange Partners (listed to the left of this page). Studying abroad provides students with a global element to their MBA and facilitates international understanding that will contribute to their careers in a globalizing business landscape.
